postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; python -m venv .venv; ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install -U pip; ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install torch==1.10.2 torchvision==0.11.3 --extra-index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu; ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install detectron2 -f https://dl.fbaipublicfiles.com/detectron2/wheels/cpu/torch1.10/index.html; if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt; fi'
